posts.title: Blood Bath Shower Gel
posts.content: Start your day off right by dousing yourself in delicious blood by bathing using the blood bath shower gel. Apart from satiating your inner haemophile, it features a delightful cherry scent and comes in a lovely human blood transfusion-like bag.

posts.title: Samurai Sword Chopsticks
posts.content: Eat sushi like a Samurai Warrior with these highly detailed miniature samurai sword chopsticks. These fully functional chopsticks are a great gift for anyone who is a heavy sushi eater or for anyone who simply enjoys Japanese culture.

posts.title: Get Shit Done Notepad
posts.content: Increase your daily productivity by setting the tone using the “get shit done” notepad. Each of the 50 sheets come stamped with the succinct message while the notepad features a magnetic back so you can conveniently hang it up on the fridge.

posts.title: Sonicare Flexcare Connected Toothbrush
posts.content: Keep your gums and teeth healthier than ever by cleaning them using the Sonicare flexcare connected toothbrush. This smart brush employs tiny sensors that tell you what parts of your mouth you’re brushing too little and which ones you’re brushing too hard.

posts.title: Meat Shredding Claws
posts.content: Create the perfect sloppy Joe or pulled pork sandwich by tearing your meat apart using these meat shredding claws. They feature sturdy teeth that interlock in two different positions for maximum shredding and come with long handles to keep you from getting dirty.

posts.title: Sphero Ultimate Lightning McQueen Toy
posts.content: Make your little driver’s racing dreams come true by getting him behind the controls of the Sphero ultimate Lightning McQueen toy. This app-enabled drifting race car reaches top speeds of 6 miles per hour and responds to your commands with his signature wit.

posts.title: Adventure Time Encyclopedia
posts.content: Explore the Land of Ooo along with Finn and Jake with the Adventure Time encyclopedia. The booklet comes jam packed with everything you ever wanted to know about all of your favorite characters, such as Princess Bubblegum and the Ice King.

posts.title: Nutella Recipe Book
posts.content: Get yourself on the fast track to obesity by molding your diet around the Nutella recipe book. Here you’ll learn how to apply this tasty condiment in dozens of different ways so that no matter what you’re in the mood for, you’ll find the ideal mouth-watering treat.

posts.title: Fatherhood Training Manual
posts.content: The arrival of new troops can be littered with potential danger, luckily the Fatherhood Training Manual is here to help you avoid them. Its pages are designed to aid newly appointed commanding officers with the know how they’ll need to help their troops survive childhood.

posts.title: Steel Dive Computer
posts.content: Ensure your next venture into the deep goes off swimmingly by keeping track of vital information using this steel dive computer. It monitors things like depth and dive time and displays them on a backlit LED screen with a colorful 320 x 240 resolution.

posts.title: USB Recharger + Surge Protector
posts.content: This USB recharger and surge protector combo is a clever way to turn a single electrical outlet into a multiple purpose electricity station. Use the USB slots to recharge your gadgets, and the electrical outlets to keep them safe from electricity spikes.

posts.title: Rainbow Flower Cushion
posts.content: Instantly brighten up any plain or drab room using one of these adorable rainbow flower cushions. This machine washable cushion measures nearly two feet in diameter and features a soft and cuddly plush exterior – making it ideal for snuggling.
